name: Hotline Madness
description:
An early stage prototype of a 'Hotline Miami 'style 2d-platformer.  And perhaps with a hint of Madness Combat.

Only one level at this time.
Difficulty: Hard.

I might develop it into a bigger project in the future if I get time.

Note: The AI is using 'dijkstra's algorithm' and could use a lot of more optimization (will probably change to A*).  So it might tank the fps in certain cases.

Made in Game Maker Studio 2.

The pixel art is made with Aseprite.

Music: Verdict - Afraid of the Dark.
